item.title: Blog Post #3 - Polling in America
item.description:
Hello world!

## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ──
## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.5     ✓ purrr   0.3.4
## ✓ tibble  3.1.6     ✓ dplyr   1.0.7
## ✓ tidyr   1.1.4     ✓ stringr 1.4.1
## ✓ readr   2.1.1     ✓ forcats 0.5.1
## Warning: package 'stringr' was built under R version 4.1.2
## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
## x dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
## New names:
## * `` -> ...1
## Rows: 74 Columns: 12
## ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## Delimiter: ","
## chr (4): party, winner_party.x, president_party, H_incumbent_party
## dbl (7): ...1, year, seats, Other_seats.x, votes, total_votes.x, majorvote_pct
## lgl (1): H_incumbent_party_winner
##

## ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

## * ...1 -> ...2
## 
## Rows: 302 Columns: 10
## ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## Delimiter: ","
## chr (2): date, year_qt
## dbl (8): ...1, ...2, GDPC1, quarter_yr, quarter_cycle, year, GDP_growth_qt, ...
## 
## ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
## ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
## Rows: 4219 Columns: 13
## ── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
## Delimiter: ","
## chr (4): pollster, type, poll_date, party
## dbl (9): Count, sample_size, bmonth, bday, year, emonth, eday, days_until_el...
## 
## ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
## ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

## `summarise()` has grouped output by 'year'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
## Joining, by = c("year", "party")

Generic Ballot Value vs Actual Over Time

Moving onto Economic Impacts
